name: Unhinged (purplemenace)
description:
In this pseudo-interactive fiction game, the phenomenon of intrusive thoughts is translated into a game mechanic by ripping control right out of your hands, and forcing you along a twisted, unnerving pattern of thought you may otherwise avoid. Get a taste of what its like to go about your day unable to control your minds own destructive impulses and suppress them accordingly.

Recommended to play in full screen.

TW for: thoughts of violence, intrusive thoughts, suicidal thoughts, passive suicidality

Photosensitivity warning: moments of quickly flashing images
